name: Minimalist
description: Clean, simple design with minimal elements and lots of white space

name: Vintage
description: Retro, nostalgic aesthetic with warm tones and film grain effects

name: Abstract
description: Artistic, non-representational visuals with bold colors and shapes

name: Cinematic
description: Professional, movie-like quality with dramatic lighting and composition

name: Cyberpunk
description: Neon-lit, dystopian future with electric colors and urban decay

name: Animated
description: Dynamic, animated graphics with fluid motion and vibrant colors

name: Noir
description: Dark, high-contrast black and white with dramatic shadows

name: Pastel
description: Soft, muted color palette with gentle tones and dreamy atmosphere

name: Neon
description: Bright, electric colors with glowing effects and high saturation

name: Monochrome
description: Black and white only with various shades of gray for contrast
